com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations

Class BaseMarkerViewOptions<U extends MarkerView,T extends BaseMarkerViewOptions<U,T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.BaseMarkerViewOptions<U,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - Type of the marker view to be composed.
    T - Type of the builder to be used for composing.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MarkerViewOptions
    Deprecated. 
    Use a SymbolLayer instead. An example of converting Android SDK views to be used as a symbol see https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-native/blob/68f32bc104422207c64da8d90e8411b138d87f04/platform/android/MapboxGLAndroidSDKTestApp/src/main/java/com/mapbox/mapboxsdk/testapp/activity/style/SymbolGeneratorActivity.java

    @Deprecated
public abstract class BaseMarkerViewOptions<U extends MarkerView,T extends BaseMarkerViewOptions<U,T>>
extends Object
    Abstract builder class for composing custom MarkerView objects.

    Extending this class requires implementing Parceable interface.
